name: Theatre Entrance
description: You are standing at the back of a large Theatre. Above grandiose wall decor to the North are the words: 'The Conductor's Job is to Make the Music Enter as a Sheaf of Scores and Leave as a Single Instrument. Music Truly Transports Us.'

north.name: Exit 1
north.description: A gilded double door leads north, slight light streaking through the thin gap running down their seam

south.name: Exit 2
south.description: The Theatre's seating area lies in the south
